item.title: Trump special counsel nominee Paul Ingrassia withdraws after racist texts flap
item.description: Ingrassia, in a text chain with other Republicans, reportedly said that he "has a Nazi streak," and that he used an Italian slur for Black people.

item.title: Trump idea to buy beef from Argentina will hurt U.S. ranchers, GOP Sen. warns
item.description: Fischer encouraged the Trump administration "to focus on trade deals that benefit our ag producersâ€”not imports that will do more harm than good."

item.title: Trump Jan. 6 pardon recipient accused of threatening to kill Democratic leader Jeffries
item.description: Christopher Moynihan, of Clinton, is charged with making a terroristic threat against Hakeem Jeffries, the House Minority Leader.
